flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: You'll need recycled paper, flour, water, scissors, string, a vase or bottle. Click here for more information.http://carolynshomework.blogspot.com/201...
guide.introduction_rendered: You'll need recycled paper, flour, water, scissors, string, a vase or bottle. Click here for more information.http://carolynshomework.blogspot.com/201...
guide.summary: Make a seed strip garland and wrap around a vase or bottle to create a spring gift. Plant the seeds, cut the flowers and use the vase.
guide.title: Seed strip garland and vase gift idea
